parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: AddTags
parameters.description: The tags to add to the product. (dict) --- Information about a tag. A tag is a key-value pair. Tags are propagated to the resources created when provisioning a product. The tag key. The value for this key.

parameters.name: RemoveTags
parameters.description: The tags to remove from the product. (string) ---

parameters.name: SourceConnection
parameters.description: Specifies connection details for the updated product and syncs the product to the connection source artifact. This automatically manages the product's artifacts based on changes to the source. The SourceConnection parameter consists of the following sub-fields. Type ConnectionParamters Type (string) --- The only supported SourceConnection type is Codestar. The connection details based on the connection Type. CodeStar (dict) --- Provides ConnectionType details. The CodeStar ARN, which is the connection between Service Catalog and the external repository. The specific repository where the product's artifact-to-be-synced resides, formatted as 'Account/Repo.' The specific branch where the artifact resides. The absolute path wehre the artifact resides within the repo and branch, formatted as 'folder/file.json.'

nested_items.name: ProductViewDetail
nested_items.description: Information about the product view.

nested_items.name: ProductViewSummary
nested_items.description: Summary information about the product view.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The product view identifier.

nested_items.name: ProductId
nested_items.description: The product identifier.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the product.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the product. Contact the product administrator for the significance of this value.

nested_items.name: ShortDescription
nested_items.description: Short description of the product.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The product type. Contact the product administrator for the significance of this value. If this value is MARKETPLACE, the product was created by Amazon Web Services Marketplace.

nested_items.name: Distributor
nested_items.description: The distributor of the product. Contact the product administrator for the significance of this value.

nested_items.name: HasDefaultPath
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the product has a default path. If the product does not have a default path, call  ListLaunchPaths to disambiguate between paths. Otherwise,  ListLaunchPaths is not required, and the output of  ProductViewSummary can be used directly with  DescribeProvisioningParameters.

nested_items.name: SupportEmail
nested_items.description: The email contact information to obtain support for this Product.

nested_items.name: SupportDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the support for this Product.

nested_items.name: SupportUrl
nested_items.description: The URL information to obtain support for this Product.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the product.
AVAILABLE - The product is ready for use.
CREATING - Product creation has started; the product is not ready for use.
FAILED - An action failed.

nested_items.name: ProductARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the product.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time stamp of the creation time.

nested_items.name: SourceConnection
nested_items.description: A top level ProductViewDetail response containing details about the product's connection. Service Catalog returns this field for the CreateProduct, UpdateProduct, DescribeProductAsAdmin, and SearchProductAsAdmin APIs. This response contains the same fields as the ConnectionParameters request, with the addition of the LastSync response.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The only supported SourceConnection type is Codestar.

nested_items.name: ConnectionParameters
nested_items.description: The connection details based on the connection Type.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The CodeStar ARN, which is the connection between Service Catalog and the external repository.

nested_items.name: Repository
nested_items.description: The specific repository where the product's artifact-to-be-synced resides, formatted as 'Account/Repo.'

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The specific branch where the artifact resides.

nested_items.name: ArtifactPath
nested_items.description: The absolute path wehre the artifact resides within the repo and branch, formatted as 'folder/file.json.'
LastSyncTime.
LastSyncStatus.
LastSyncStatusMessage.
LastSuccessfulSyncTime.
LastSuccessfulSyncProvisioningArtifactID.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Information about the tags associated with the product.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for this key.
